welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Evans, a charming city known for its beautiful parks and friendly community. We invite you to explore and experience all that Evans has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Daniel Field Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Daniel Field Airport is exclusively for private flights and offers VIP services.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a password is required for access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bush Field Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Bush Field Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport is the primary hub for all commercial flights and services.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Municipal Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
